attribute.value: select cpdh as key,ms as value from csb_cpxz where cplx='2'
select qxdh as key,qxmc as value from CSB_QXSDB where jxdxlx=2 union select '-1' as key,'全部期限' as value from pas_vt
select bz as key,bzzwmc as value from csb_bz where bz!='0A' AND bz!='0B' AND bz!='0C' AND bz!='FF'
select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where jgdh='$jgdh$'
select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where khdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$
select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'
select cpdh as key,ms as value from csb_cpxz where cplx='2'
select qxdh as key,qxmc as value from CSB_QXSDB where jxdxlx=2 union select '-1' as key,'全部期限' as value from pas_vt
select bz as key,bzzwmc as value from csb_bz where bz!='0A' AND bz!='0B' AND bz!='0C' AND bz!='FF'
select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where jgdh='$jgdh$'
select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where khdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$
select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select XS, QSRQ, JGDH, FHFDJ, PLBZ, JSRQ, BZ, CPDH, QXDH, ZYJG from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where 1= 1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select XS, QSRQ, JGDH, FHFDJ, PLBZ, JSRQ, BZ, CPDH, QXDH, ZYJG from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where 1= 1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK( BZ, QSRQ, JGDH, CPDH, JSRQ, QXDH, ZYJG ) values ( '$bz$',$qsrq$,'$jgdh$','$cpdh$',$jsrq$,'$qxdh$',$zyjg$)
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK set ZYJG = $zyjg$ where 1=1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where 1=1 and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where qsrq >=$qsrq$ and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK set jsrq=$qdate$ where $qsrq$ between qsrq and jsrq and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where 1=1 and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select XS, QSRQ, JGDH, FHFDJ, PLBZ, JSRQ, BZ, CPDH, QXDH, ZYJG from CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK where 1=1 and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$' and $qsrq$ > $maxqsrq$
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update CSB_NBZJZYDJ_DK set jsrq =29991231 where 1=1 and JGDH = '$jgdh$' and BZ = '$bz$' and CPDH = '$cpdh$' and QXDH = '$qxdh$' and jsrq =$lastjsrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where jgdh='$jgdh$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,jgdh,jgmc from khdx_jg where khdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select cpdh as key,ms as value from csb_cpxz where cplx='2'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select qxdh as key,qxmc as value from CSB_QXSDB where jxdxlx=2 union select '-1' as key,'全部期限' as value from pas_vt
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select bz as key,bzzwmc as value from csb_bz where bz!='0A' AND bz!='0B' AND bz!='0C' AND bz!='FF'

javascript.query: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //页面加载后运行一次 //$('#jgkhdxdh_mc').attr('prevalue',' '); $('#jgkhdxdh_mc').val(' ');//显示在外控件上 空格使得显示为空 $('#jgkhdxdh').val('0');//内部隐藏控件id 查询时候所用的值 }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ return true;//点击summit条件通过返回true则提交 }
javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 PAS.di.execute('dkftpgl_getMaxqsrq',getMaxqsrqBack);//加载最大的起始日期 if($("#page_operate").val()=='update'){ $('#jgkhdxdh_mc').attr("disabled","disabled"); PAS.di.execute('dkftpgl_getJgInfoByJgdh',setEditForm);//更改的写法 }else{ $('#jgkhdxdh_mc').val(' '); $('#jgkhdxdh').val(1); $('#jgkhdxdh_dh').val('0'); $('#jgkhdxdh_mc').removeAttr("disabled"); PAS.di.execute('dkftpgl_getJgInfoByKhdxdh',setEditForm);//更改的写法 } }); function setEditForm(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ var jgkhdxdh=obj.data[0].JGKHDXDH; var jgdh=obj.data[0].JGDH; var jgmc=obj.data[0].JGMC; if(jgkhdxdh==1){ $('#jgkhdxdh_dh').val(jgdh); } $("#jgkhdxdh_mc").val(jgmc); $("#jgkhdxdh_mc").attr('prevalue',jgmc); $("#jgkhdxdh_dh").val(jgdh); $("#jgkhdxdh_dh").attr('prevalue',jgdh); $("#jgkhdxdh").val(jgkhdxdh); $("#jgkhdxdh").attr('prevalue',jgkhdxdh); } } function getMaxqsrqBack(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ maxqsrq = obj.data[0].MAXQSRQ; PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } } //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ if(maxqsrq>parseInt($('#qsrq').val())){ parent.custom_alert('由于重算天数的限制，起始日期最大只能是：'+maxqsrq); return false; } //alert('jgkhdxdh_dh='+$("#jgkhdxdh_dh").val()); if($("#jgkhdxdh_dh").val()!=null&&$("#jgkhdxdh_dh").val()!=''){ $("#jgdh").val($("#jgkhdxdh_dh").val()); }else{ $("#jgdh").val('0'); } var cpdh = jQuery('#cpdh').val(); if(cpdh==null||cpdh==''){ alert('产品不能为空'); jQuery('#cpdh').focus(); return false; } return true; }
